sentence: Hamas  attacked  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  1,200  people  and  taking  240  hostages  ,  some  of  whom  were  released  during  a  short-lived  truce.
Hamas  officials  in  Gaza  say  Israel  has  killed  more  than  17,177  people  in  its  retaliatory  campaign,  including  about  7,000  children.
